title: Medical Foundational Curriculum Design Applying Cognitive Load Reduction Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: A short-term intensive course for working professionals, structured around practical tasks considering relevance to job responsibilities.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the basic structure and function of human physiological systems through VR simulation with over 80% accuracy
Learners can apply a three-stage information processing strategy to reduce cognitive load in diagnostic scenarios using medical terminology
Learners can analyze performance data from 4-week learning pathways in simulation-based assessments to predict optimal learning pathways with 70% accuracy.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
